scripts.build:all: npm run build:linux-amd64 && npm run build:darwin-amd64 && npm run build:darwin-arm64 && npm run build:windows-amd64
scripts.build:linux-amd64: cross-env GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -ldflags="-s -w" -o ../../apps/vscode-extension/cli/codetracker-cli-linux-amd64 main.go
scripts.build:darwin-amd64: cross-env GOOS=darwin GOARCH=amd64 go build -ldflags="-s -w" -o ../../apps/vscode-extension/cli/codetracker-cli-darwin-amd64 main.go
scripts.build:darwin-arm64: cross-env GOOS=darwin GOARCH=arm64 go build -ldflags="-s -w" -o ../../apps/vscode-extension/cli/codetracker-cli-darwin-arm64 main.go
scripts.build:windows-amd64: cross-env GOCACHE=%TEMP%\.gocache GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 go build -ldflags="-s -w" -o ../../apps/vscode-extension/cli/codetracker-cli-win32-amd64.exe main.go
